page.title: 01RANSKILL- GENERAL
page.content: Ranskill is a mediumish sized village.It has a church,a chapel,a park,a pub,2 village shops,a post office,a chip shop and 2 VOLVO garages.Ranskill has grown considerably over the last few years. It has a very new housing estate with a cul-de-sac and most of the other houses are aged from 10 to nearly 200 yrs. old .We have a village paper called 'the STAR'(which means Scrooby, Torworth and Ranskill) that comes out every month.It is a free paper and it has news about all the activities that go on,for example:guides,brownies, cubs,womens institute,R.A.T.S. (Ranskill's football team)and also nature and cooking items.Our park is quite big compared to some,it has 6 swings,a see-saw,a slide,a rocking boat,climbing frame,dirty sandpit and a football pitch.
